item.description:
Hello Ladies!

Friday January 15th is set for CAIN (www.cainnyc.com) for a fun filled night of drinking and dancing. I will be linking up with the promoter that night (since he will be there) to set up the table and free bottle service since I want this to be a gauranteed thing (the free bottle). It is free to get in under the guestlist, "Special K" (my alias from back in the day of event planning).

The dress code is DRESS TO IMPRESS. Basically dress like you are going to a club and not a ball game lol.

The address is: 544 NW 27TH STREET. NEW YORK NEW YORK (OFF 11TH AVENUE)

I would like us to meet at the Astoria Diner (off of the Steinway Street Subway) at 10:00. The address is: 3250 Steinway Street. I am very punctual so I will be there at 10:00 p.m. Cain gets REALLY packed and I don't want us to end up paying at the door so I want to leave by 10:15 by cab or train. I know a cab service that can pick us up, therefore it would probably cost $5 or less per person to get to the club. I figured that would be a better idea instead of freezing in the cold. If you can NOT meet me at the diner and want to go at a later time, feel free to, but please let me know if you will be going alone or with the group!
The bottle service will be free (must be set up that night) but they do require tipping. So I figured $5 per person and I will cover the rest of the tip. So I figured for a night out in the city it would cost under $25 (counting cost to get home). Not bad eh?

So anyway ladies...sorry for the detailed note I just wanted to be clear on everything. If you have any questions please email me or text/call me at: 646-408-5224

See you ladies on Friday!!
item.name: Dancing in the City
